sbISingleItemTransferContext Interface Reference

Public Attributes

readonly attribute sbIMediaItem item
 The single item media item payload.

Detailed Description

This interface represents a transfer of a single media item.

This interface will be sent with the following flavor: application/x-sb-transfer-media-item

Note that a media item may indeed be a media list, so the consumers of this context will want to check if it is a media list if they wish to handle lists differently.
